name: Date++
short_description: Date++ is a collection of C++ classes for calendrical computations mostly conforming to ISO 8601 standard. It allows users to perform computations involving dates, weeks, months, quarters and years. Date++ is a lightweight library with no dependencies that could be useful in various projects that need calendrical computations.
